5. Family history of systemic illness â€“ Ask the woman whether there is a family history of hypertension 
thyroid dysfunction, diabetes or tuberculosis,asthma,thalassemia or whether anybody in the family has received 
repeated blood transfusions.If present, such a history predisposes the woman to developing these problems 
during pregnancy (e.g., hypertensive disorders of pregnancy and gestational diabetes).
